H0.text: Who had the most expensive presidential inauguration ceremony of the 20th century. Ronald Reagan

H1.text: Who had the most expensive presidential inauguration ceremony of the 20th century. Jimmy Carter

H2.text: Who had the most expensive presidential inauguration ceremony of the 20th century. Bill Clinton

H3.text: Who had the most expensive presidential inauguration ceremony of the 20th century. Dubya

A4.text: Since the 1981 first inauguration of Ronald Reagan, they have been held on the Capitol's west front; a move designed to both cut costs and to provide more space for spectators.
